moody.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Keith had seemed moody all morning.
moody.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: often changing quickly from being in a good temper to being in a bad temper
moody.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Lewis was moody and brilliantly clever.
moody.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: moody places, films, pictures, and music make you feel slightly sad, lonely, or perhaps frightened
